about_the_game:
Paint your truck with a choice of 6 prehistoric themed paint jobs!

  • Ice Age
  • Winged Lizard
  • Sea Monster
  • Saber Tooth
  • Apex Predator
  • Horned Face

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Paint your truck with a choice of 6 prehistoric themed paint jobs!

  • Ice Age
  • Winged Lizard
  • Sea Monster
  • Saber Tooth
  • Apex Predator
  • Horned Face

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
legal_notice: (c) 2015 SCS Software. All brand names, trademarks, registered marks, logos, and symbols on vehicles in the game are property of their rightful owners. Used with kind permission.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
